name: THE MORE THE MERRIER
description:
WARNING: Because of [BAD PROGRAMMING], rockets don't collide properly in low FPS. Yeah, it sucks but no time to fix it How to Play:

For every bullet you shoot, there's a 50/50 chance that an enemy will spawn in the nearest spawn point to you. The map starts with ~14 enemies. Enemies always die with 1 shot. Killing an enemy gives you 2 health points, including deaths from rockets.

Oh yeah, rockets! Press Q to shoot a rocket. You start with 1 rockets. Rocket spawners give you 1 rocket every 30 seconds.

PROTIP: Everytime an enemy spawns, a metallic-like sound plays from the spawner it spawned in. The game's audio is binaural, so you can probably spot the general direction of the enemy from the sound.

WASD to move, Mouse to look, Left Mouse Button to shoot and Spacebar to jump. Esc also immediately closes the game.
